title: Looks like Calibri
author: zerimar3

comments.content: It must be **[Open Sans (Light)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130857/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Open%20Sans%20-%20Light&fid=1bf71be111189e76987a4bb9b3115cb7&fsize=60&text=iOS7%20Redesign%20Concept&wrap=2)** by Steve Matteson, now part of Google Web Fonts
Interesting, I was just looking at Vectora but the lower case "s" differs. Thank you for the help, it's spot on!
